channel.title: Need help putting running my source on VPS
channel.description:
i need help running my server on vps, im using trentahost, iv done the remote conection thigy and iv go my Source on the vps desktop, when i click run i get errors. these are the two diffrent path files i have used to try and run it: Number1) ---------- @echo off title runserver "\\tsclient\C\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause
number2) ---------- @echo off title runserver "C\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause
Skype: Huseyinn.7 (i have team viewer 8)

item.title: Need help putting running my source on VPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I can’t possibly wonder why:
"\tsclient\C\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe"
Would give errors. Except for the fact that that isn’t a valid directory.
Make sure to get the correct java for the vps (if it is a x64 bit machine, get x64 bit java, if 32, get 32).

Read full topic
item.source: Need help putting running my source on VPS

item.title: Need help putting running my source on VPS
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

download the latest java development kit on the vps then change the path.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help putting running my source on VPS
item.dc:creator: @kmsx kmsx
item.description:
@kmsx wrote:

i need help running my server on vps, im using trentahost, iv done the remote conection thigy and iv go my Source on the vps desktop, when i click run i get errors.
these are the two diffrent path files i have used to try and run it:
Number1)

@echo off
title runserver
"\tsclient\C\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

number2)

@echo off
title runserver
"C\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

Skype: Huseyinn.7 (i have team viewer 8)

Read full topic
